name: Reversed Brain
description:
CONTROLS:
WASD: MOVE
1: Gun
2: Bandage
Hold Right Mouse Button To Aim,
Then Hold/Press Left Button to Shoot while aiming
E: Interact
F: Toggle Flashlight

When Cahyadi Drives home after getting his milk in the mall, Cahyadi got distracted ,crashed his car, and goes into unconsiousness. When he woke up, he found himself inside an abandoned Hospital. Sukmadi must find a way out of this hospital to survive
